thread.title: Johnny Lever-starrer comedy to release on April 1
thread.title_full: Johnny Lever-starrer comedy to release on April 1 - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Johnny Lever-starrer comedy to release on April 1
text:
Actor Johnny Lever is all set to tickle people's funny bones with Sameer Iqbal Patel's directorial debut 'Hotel Beautifool', which is set to release on April 1 next year.

Johnny Lever 
According to Patel, April 1 is an “apt day to release the film”, because it is also April Fool's Day.
"It's like hand-in-glove situation to release it on the 1st of April and we are lucky to get a Friday on All Fools' Day," producer Mohammed Aslam Shaikh said in a statement.
The film also features actors Rajith Menon, Brijendra Kala, Imam Siddique, Rohit Khurana, Alisha Farrer, Shaanti, Sandip Gosh and Manoj Santoshi, among others.
'Hotel Beautifool' has been co-produced by Shaikh and Madhire Ravinder Reddy under Umbrella Film Corporation and Madhire Film Corporation.
